snippet: An illuminated Renaissance prayer book — which once sold for $13.3 million — is scheduled to come up for auction in January.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; illuminated Renaissance prayer book, which once sold for $13.3 million, will be auctioned by Christie's in January 2014; Sotheby's will auction marble figure of satyr from first century AD; Christie's is selling art from estate of New Jersey Sen Frank R Lautenberg, who died in June 2013; David Zwirner gallery outpost in London takes on artist Bridget Riley.
lead_paragraph: An illuminated Renaissance prayer book — which once sold for $13.3 million — is scheduled to come up for auction in January.

headline.main: Renaissance Prayer Book Is Set for Auction
headline.print_headline: Renaissance Prayer Book Is Set for Auction
